group_1.textCenter: As I'm sure you've realized, the impostor@was played by Rena.
All of the people you've interviewed, and@the people of the counseling room were in on it.
The photograph is just a very well-made@composite.
The only one who didn't know what was@going on was Akira.
She was away from the counseling room@troubleshooting.

group_1.textLeft: If you came alone, I was supposed to@use Kaede as a hostage.
I was told to leave you no choice except@turning to the counseling room for help.
That's why I was waiting there.
Apparently everyone was supposed to@solve the mystery together.

group_1.textRight: Why...?

group_1.textLeft: Well, here's the plot we had in mind.

group_1.narration: "Sae is troubled by the appearance@of the Impersonator Magical Girl,@so she visits the counseling room and@gets everyone to come investigate with her."
"While investigating,@Sae encounters the impostor at the arcade,@but the impostor escapes,@and feels pressured when she can't track them down."
"So Sae works together with everyone from@the counseling room to solve that case!"
"She couldn't do it alone,@but she was able to solve it by working with everyone!@Happily ever after!"

group_1.textLeft: It was supposed to go something like that.

group_1.textRight: But you made it to the arcade before@I was ready.
After that, when I turned into you and@tried to escape...
You nearly caught me...

group_1.textLeft: In the end, you went off on your own.
So Emiri contacted Rena and Kaede in a hurry.
The plan was changed to taking Kaede hostage...@And that's what happened.

group_1.textRight: ...*Sigh* So why did you do this?

group_1.textLeft: ...We wanted you to be able to rely on others.
Now that the Wings of the Magius is gone,@things have calmed down.
When the Magius were gathering Witches,@Kamihama was much more dangerous.
It's peaceful in Kamihama right now, and@there's no conflict, but...
No one knows what's going to happen next.
Thus, if you're unable to rely on others@when the next crisis strikes Kamihama...
We were afraid that you would end up@tightening a noose around your own neck...
That's why we were worried about you, Sae...
I'm sure that Emiri and the others have@told you this several times...
And yet...

group_1.textRight: Huh...

group_1.textCenter: That's right! You should totally count on me@more!
(It's true, she's told me that many times.)
(And I had no intention to accept her help...)

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, Saechi!
It was all my idea.
It's not Mitamacho's fault, she just helped...
To be real with you, you're like a superwoman.
It's super rad how you can do totally anything,@but...
You're always doing everything on your own@without asking for help...
I thought you might turn to us if we@pulled some pranks on you...

group_1.textRight: (So that's what those were about...)

group_1.textLeft: But you're just too perfect...
For all that mischief, and this incident...
I must apologize for being so forceful...
However, fighting Witches is always@accompanied by danger.
Who knows what will happen if you@keep fighting alone?

group_1.textRight: You're definitely strong, but still.
It's risky to keep working solo.
Well, it's not just about hunting Witches,@though...
...But I'm too busy with schoolwork to@be a part of a team.
I don't have much time to hunt Witches,@so I wouldn't want to be an inconvenience...

group_1.textLeft: We're not asking you to form a team.
We just want you to seek help when@you're troubled.
You never ask for help, so we became worried@about you...and wronged you as a result...

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry for tricking you, as well...
Sae, you're such a kind girl...
You're always working so hard on your own.@People worry about you.
I couldn't bring myself to leave you alone...
...That's...

group_1.textLeft: I was scared.
I'm afraid that one day, when you find yourself@in trouble or run into danger...
You're gonna go off on your own and vanish...
But telling you directly and playing pranks@didn't work.
It escalated, and this was all I could@come up with.
Sorry for making such a big deal out of it@and causing you trouble.

group_1.textRight: ...Emiri.
I'm sorry, it was my fault... I apologize@for making you all worry.
...From now on, I'll make sure to rely on you@properly.

group_1.textLeft: Saechi...

group_1.textRight: ...However, may I ask you one thing?
Why did you decide to create an impostor?

group_1.textLeft: You once mentioned being scared of ghosts...
I figured you would be hooked.@I suggested it myself.

group_1.textRight: Sure enough, it was your fault...

group_1.textLeft: Of course, I haven't told anyone about@your secret.
Oh yes, Rena did act a bit like the real you.
But I merely asked her to act a little bad.@*Giggle*

group_1.textRight: ...You're pretty bad, yourself.

group_1.textLeft: But I mean it when I say you should@rely on others more.

group_1.textRight: Indeed, it was a little frightening.@*Giggle*
Everyone was so good at acting.
Of course, such skills are trivial for me,@Ria Ami.

group_1.textLeft: It seriously felt like you were chasing an@impostor half-way through...!

group_1.textRight: I got too caught up in the role...

group_1.textLeft: Shouldn't you charge a performance fee?

group_1.textRight: *Giggling*

group_1.textLeft: I'm so sorry, Sae.
When all those pranks happened...
I should've said something to them...

group_1.textRight: It's no problem, I'm thankful to you as well,@Akira.
...By the way, the two occasions where@I ran into you...
Were those the only times you@were transformed as me?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, didn't I already tell you?
All those stories about me acting wild@while looking like you were made up.

group_1.textRight: Right, I see.
(So that means...back then...)

group_1.textCenter: (Huh... I thought I felt someone's presence@just now...)
